Judul: Inviting embodied  imagination to the semiotic  eigenbehavior Musical party
Abstrak: The  main  goal  of  this  commentary is to provide an impetus toward the integration of some aspects of musical  enactivism  and  ecological  psychology into the framework of the semiotic eigencycle.  I  argue  that  the  notions  of embodied  imagination  and  musical  affordances at the level of interaction between  agent  and  musical  environment, play a robustly causal or perhaps even a constitutive  role  in  the  music  cognitive semiotic process.
Sumber: Source:     Constructivist Foundations. July2017, Vol. 12 Issue 3, p356-359. 4p.
